org.canova.image.recordreader

Class BaseImageRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.canova.image.recordreader.BaseImageRecordReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Configurable, RecordReader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageNameRecordReader, ImageNetRecordReader, ImageRecordReader

    public abstract class BaseImageRecordReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordReader
    Base class for the image record reader
    See Also:
